Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This is a stretch of $(this.trait:streetname) $[capitalize($this."trait:streettype")]. Morning has broken and the first rays of sunshine can be seen shimmering down. The sun has risen and the hustle and bustle of the city is audible from a distance. The midday sun is high in the sky and waves of heat can be seen shimmering off the nearby bricks. The bright blue skies of the afternoon bathe every corner of the park in sunlight. The sun has set and the park is shadowed in the failing light. Evening has fallen and the park is dimmed. There is a slight chill in the air. Midnight has enveloped the silent park. A slight lightening of the sky bathes the park in an eerie light as dawn approaches. $[if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 0) { return "There are no visible exits.";} else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 1) { return "There is a single exit from here to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 2) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 3) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 4) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 5) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 6) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 7) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 8) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 9) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 10) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[9])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else { return "There are multiple exits visible."; }]
A stretch of $(this.trait:streetname) $[capitalize($this."trait:streettype")]. The park is well lit by bright sunlight. The park is enfolded in the cloak of night.
A blanket of lush grass fills the expanse between the walls here, and the bricked road directly west. Due to this the swath of grass has taken on a rounded triangular shape.
A blanket of lush grass fills the expanse between the walls here, and the bricked road to the west.
A single blade of grass that comprises the lush lawn here.
A single blade of grass that comprises the lush lawn here.
Beneath the grass is soft soil, bordered to the west by brick, and enclosed by a wall to the north and south. The ground here comes to a distinct point to the east, the namesake of the park.
Beneath the grass is soft soil, bordered to the west by brick.
the main wall that encompasses New Town

The main wall that encompasses New Town. It is crafted from large, heavy drab stones. Though it rises several stories around most of the city, here it has within it carved arches to allow the scent and sound of the aqueduct near-by to surround the place.

The main wall that encompasses New Town. It is crafted from large, heavy drab stones. Though it rises several stories around most of the city, here it has within it carved arches to allow the scent and sound of the aqueduct near-by to surround the place.
